== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: 1.1
var1:
  description: a second variable
  multi: true
  default:
    - no
    - yes
  validators:
    - jinja: |
        {% if _.var1 | length > 9 %}
        length must be less than 10
        {% endif %}
      description: check length is less than 10
----
